duties_responsibilities.duty: Assist the Store Manager with oversight of the Stationstore operations and staff supervision.
Participate in hiring, supervising and working with the staff to accomplish daily tasks, bookkeeping and merchandising.
Maintain high standards and provide fast and friendly service to customers.
Execute the company's food program and set an example for the staff.
Plan and organize work schedules and communicate plans and ideas effectively.
Handle cash and perform bookkeeping tasks, while also advocating for safety and security.
